titleStmt.title: C. R. By the King. To our trusty and welbeloved our colonells, lievtenant-colonells, serjeant-majors, captaines, and all other our officers of our army.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: by Leonard Lichfield printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: "From our court at Oxford, this twentieth [i.e. twelfth; cf. Steele] of January, 1642.".
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.

Includes: An agreement of the great inquest made at the last sessions for the county of Worcester, for the raising of three thousand pound monethly, towards the payment of His Majesties forces, sent and raised for defence of the said county and city of VVorcester.
"This appears to be a London counterfeit reprint"--Madan.
Identified as Wing C2531 on UMI microfilm set "Early English Books, 1741-1700" reel 1629.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
